description: This file defines the NotificationService class, which provides various methods to interact with notification-related API endpoints, such as fetching notifications, updating read status, deleting notifications, managing settings, and subscribing to real-time updates via WebSocket.

classes.name: NotificationService
classes.description: A service class that encapsulates API interactions related to notifications, including fetching, updating, deleting, and subscribing to notifications.

methods.name: getNotifications
methods.description: Fetch a paginated list of notifications with optional filters.

methods.name: getNotification
methods.description: Retrieve a specific notification by its ID.

methods.name: markAsRead
methods.description: Mark a particular notification as read.

methods.name: markAsUnread
methods.description: Mark a specific notification as unread.

methods.name: markAllAsRead
methods.description: Mark all notifications as read for the current user.

methods.name: deleteAllRead
methods.description: Delete all read notifications for the current user.

methods.name: getUnreadCount
methods.description: Get the count of unread notifications.

methods.name: getNotificationSettings
methods.description: Retrieve notification preferences/settings for the current user.

methods.name: updateNotificationSettings
methods.description: Update notification settings/preferences for the current user.

methods.name: subscribeToUpdates
methods.description: Subscribe to real-time notification updates via WebSocket.

methods.name: executeNotificationAction
methods.description: Trigger an action associated with a notification.
